name: Ryu-Ge World Creation
text: Add 1 "Ryu-Ge" monster from your Deck to your hand, then you can add 1 "Ryu-Ge" Pendulum Monster from your hand to your Extra Deck face-up. During your Main Phase, if you control a "Ryu-Ge" Pendulum Monster Card: You can banish this card and 1 "Ryu-Ge" monster from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Ryu-Ge" monster from your Deck with the same original Type as the monster banished. You can only use 1 "Ryu-Ge World Creation" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
